titles.title: Albuquerque Indian Health Center Act of 2005
A bill to designate the Albuquerque Indian Health Center as a critical access facility and to provide funds for that Center.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Indian Affairs.

bill.summary: 4/28/2005--Introduced. Albuquerque Indian Health Center Act of 2005 - Designates the Albuquerque Indian Health Center as a critical access facility. Directs the Secretary of Health and Human Services to provide funds made available under this Act to the Center to carry out its operations.
